bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of cough in children within the first 100 days of their life. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bei mu 貝母 quoting Huo you xin shu 活幼心書 百日內嬰孩，咳嗽有痰 , “When the cough of children within the [first] 100 days of their life includes phlegm”, writes: 小兒晬嗽， 百日內咳嗽，痰壅 , “ Brittle days cough of children: This is cough within the first 100 days with phlegm obstruction”.
